title: Free True Soul Nere
content:
attempt a Perception check to focus and see more through Nere's eyes. If you fail, you won't be able to make anything of the vision and lose the connection, while you sense Nere's frustration.

If you take a Long Rest or travel between zones, True Soul Nere will communicate telepathically telling asking you to hurry because the poison is spreading.

You need to find Smokepowder. Elder Brithvar (at the end of the hall where Nere is trapped) mentioned that a deep gnome fled with some, and to ask
